body_html:
Aha! I forgot to add the all_files symlink in the contrib/seq2seq/BUILD file. I just pushed it, sorry for the inconvenience! Please try and rerun @jhseu

On a related note: Do you have a guide on how to run these "Jenkins" test locally so I can skip the trouble of having your admins debug for me? Thanks.

body:
Aha! I forgot to add the `all_files` symlink in the `contrib/seq2seq/BUILD` file. I just pushed it, sorry for the inconvenience! Please try and rerun @jhseu 

On a related note: Do you have a guide on how to run these "Jenkins" test locally so I can skip the trouble of having your admins debug for me? Thanks.
